thing-type.label: MH-S513 Touch Panel Switch 3-Way
thing-type.description: Touch Panel Switch 3-Way<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTouch Panel Switch is a wall panel built-in with Z-Wave Plus module. With its stylish design and stable performance, the panel can be used to control house-hold electrical appliances like lamp, motor, coffee machine, TV set etc. It supports basic command class，multi channel command class and multi channel association command class, also works as a repeater in a Z-Wave network. This product can be included and operated in any Z-Wave network with other Z-Wave certified devices from any other manufacturers.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtINCLUDING the device into Z-Wave network:</p&gt <p&gt1. Set controller into INCLUSION mode. Follow instructions provided by controller manufacturer.</p&gt <p&gt2. Press and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession.</p&gt <p&gtNote: If inclusion is successful, all INDICATION LEDs on the panel will flash 4 times. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtEXCLUDING the device from Z-Wave network:</p&gt <p&gt1. Set controller into EXCLUSION mode. Follow instructions provided by controller manufacturer.</p&gt <p&gt2. Press and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession.</p&gt <p&gtNote: If the exclusion is successful, all INDICATION LEDs on the panel will flash 4 times. The exclusion will delete all association data.</p&gt
